message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you a great opportunity to purchase my product. Given its value, I believe a price of $9,500 is fair. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $8,500 for it. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
Bob, I understand your position, but $8,500 is a bit too low for me.  Would you consider meeting halfway at $9,000?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I am still unable to meet at $9,000. I would like to counter with $8,800 if possible.
